Yosefshariat,

On Sun, Nov 16, 2008 at 3:44 AM, yosefshariat <yosefshariat@...> wrote:
> Hi
> I want to manage all test scenario and report of result with software.
> I wrote any unit test and run and generate many reports from them.
> I want software or any things which manage scenario and generate
> report for result of unit tests (JUnit).
> What do you offer?
>
>
